description.value:
Your knowledge of monsters is so incredible that it reveals glaring flaws in your prey. Your bonus from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Monster Hunter] (and the bonus from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Monster Warden] if you have it) increases from +1 to +2 for you and any allies who benefit.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter]

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Legendary Monster Warden]
